ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of CARL FRIESEN of Whitehorse, Yukon, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc territorial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
